cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 30th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 30th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: 6 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription:
Adventure Hostels deluxe dormitories offers as standard: 
Bespoke hand-built bunks featuring ultra comfortable mattresses, reading lights, privacy curtains, USB & electrical charing outlets, two pillows and linen made up and ready to hop straight into.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
